Plot: An earthquake reaching a 10.5 magnitude on the Richter scale, strikes the west coast of the U.S. and Canada. A large portion of land falls into the ocean, and the situation is worsened by aftershocks and tsunami.
Actors: Kim Delaney, Fred Ward, Ivan Sergei, Dulé Hill
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
